item.title: About
item.description: üëãüèΩ Hi, I’m Felix. üéì I’m a mechanical engineer and currently studying production engineering with a specialization in information technology at the TU Berlin. üéì Before that, I completed a dual intensive degree program (210 ECTS) in mechanical engineering at the HWR Berlin in six semesters. üí™üèΩ As a dual student, I was able to apply the knowledge I had gained in a total of 85 weeks at MTU Maintenance-Berlin Brandenburg.

item.title: Privacy
item.description: Introduction With the following data protection declaration, we would like to inform you about the types of your personal data (hereinafter also referred to as “data” for short) that we process, for what purposes and to what extent. The data protection declaration applies to all processing of personal data carried out by us, both as part of the provision of our services and, in particular, on our websites, in mobile applications and within external online presences, such as our social media profiles (hereinafter collectively referred to as the “Online Offer”).

item.title: Resume
item.description: Education Studies: Production engineering, specialization in information technology Technical University of Berlin October 2022 - today Master of Science Focuses on data evaluation in quality management. Study: Design and Manufacturing, Mechanical Engineering Berlin School of Economics and Law. October 2018 - September 2021 Bachelor of Engineering with 210 ECTS Average grade: 1.8 (ECTS grade B) Bachelor thesis: “Design and testing of rotating lances for intensity enhancement in shot peening”.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Digital twin: medical equipment cart. Developing a digital twin concept and prototype for monitoring medical devices and a medical device cart. For more information, see the Github page. Design and testing of rotating lances for intensity improvement in shot peening.
